timeline.title: High School Champion
timeline.description: Won state archery championship with perfect score of 720

timeline.title: College Recruitment
timeline.description: Accepted full scholarship to Stanford University Cardinal

timeline.title: College Champion
timeline.description: NCAA Archery Champion, broke collegiate record with 702.5 score

timeline.title: Professional Debut
timeline.description: Joined USA Archery National Team, ranked #1 in compound division

timeline.title: Olympic Champion
timeline.description: Won Olympic Gold Medal in Individual Compound Archery

achievements.title: Team USA Captain
achievements.description: Led Team USA to World Championship Victory

achievements.title: Archer of the Year
achievements.description: World Archery Federation Athlete of the Year 2023

media.title: Award Ceremony
media.description: Receiving World Archer of the Year

news.title: Prathamesh Jawkar shocks world No.1 to win maiden archery World Cup gold
